properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 2:05PM AKST until January 20 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches.

* WHERE...Glacier Bay and the city of Gustavus.

* WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches
reported through early afternoon. Snow will diminish late this
evening.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT FOR THE NORTHERN INNER CHANNELS
